a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHepatitisB3Delayed (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis B.Delayed start) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 3-dose schedule (no birth dose + 3 doses), delayed start * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHepatitisB3Delayed

def.name: Client is due for hepatitis B vaccination

a:s.a:s: "Client's age is more than {Member States defined upper limit}"

operand.name: No hepatitis B doses were administered
Client's age is more than {Member States defined upper limit}

def.name: Client is due for hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: 'Should vaccinate client for first hepatitis B dose as hepatitis B birth dose was not administered. The first hepatitis B dose should be administered as soon as possible. Check for contraindications.'

expression.value: Should vaccinate client for first hepatitis B dose as hepatitis B birth dose was not administered. The first hepatitis B dose should be administered as soon as possible. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

"The first hepatitis B dose was administered less than 6 months ago"

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Two hepatitis B doses have been administered to the client. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Two hepatitis B doses have been administered to the client. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

then.value: Should vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance
